hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
export VMNAME="HAAS-ova-hpuchoweb" /puppet/jenkins/bin/vbox.init build small /puppet/jenkins/bin/vbox.init start /puppet/jenkins/bin/vbox.init fixup /puppet/jenkins/bin/vbox.init ssh 'wget https://haas.cesnet.cz/haas.git/bootstrap.install.sh && sh -x bootstrap.install.sh' ###################
/puppet/jenkins/bin/vbox.init ssh 'cd /puppet && sh phase2.install.sh' /puppet/jenkins/bin/vbox.init ssh 'cd /puppet && sh metalib/tests/phase2.sh'
/puppet/jenkins/bin/vbox.init ssh 'cd /puppet && sh hpucho-web.install.sh' /puppet/jenkins/bin/vbox.init ssh 'cd /puppet && sh hpucho/tests/web.sh' ###################
/puppet/jenkins/bin/vbox.init ssh 'cd /puppet && sh jenkins/bin/haas_vm_cleanup.sh' /puppet/jenkins/bin/vbox.init shutdown /puppet/jenkins/bin/vbox.init export "/data/builds/HAAS-hpuchoweb.ova" /puppet/jenkins/bin/vbox.init destroy
################### /puppet/jenkins/bin/vbox.init import "/data/builds/HAAS-hpuchoweb.ova" /puppet/jenkins/bin/vbox.init start /puppet/jenkins/bin/vbox.init ssh 'cd /puppet && sh jenkins/bin/haas_vm_prepare.sh' || true /bin/sleep 60 /puppet/jenkins/bin/vbox.init ssh 'cd /puppet && sh jenkins/bin/haas_vm_finalize.sh -a -w "$(/puppet/metalib/bin/avahi_findservice.sh _warden-server._tcp)" -n "$(/puppet/jenkins/bin/haas_vm_generate_w3cname.sh).uchoweb" -t DUMMY' /puppet/jenkins/bin/vbox.init ssh 'cd /puppet && sh hpucho/tests/web.sh'
